metadata.synopsis: Dalyria and Petra at the flophouse.They are looking for Astarion at the place where they used to "hunt".This is a dialog for when they meet the player without Astarion.Dalyria tries to seduce the player and invite them to Cazador's mansion, but Petra tells her not to get distracted - they are only here to look for "that person".
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Vampire Spawns Duo at FlophouseWalk in the direction the player character is facing.Click on Petra or Dalyria.

0.speaker: Dalyria
0.text: We are just leaving. We have a celebration to attend.

33.speaker: Pale Petras
33.text: One more mark, then we can go.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: player is a little far away from the two vampire spawn

66.speaker: Dalyria
66.text: The master said we have enough - the Black Mass is ready to begin.
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: player hides just out of view

17.speaker: Pale Petras
17.text: It's not for the master, it's for me. I want a beating heart there, ready for me when the Mass is complete and we're finally granted our freedom.

37.speaker: Pale Petras
37.text: After two hundred years of rats, I think we deserve a real drink.

12.speaker: Dalyria
12.text: There is no time, we are expected back at the palace.

69.speaker: Pale Petras
69.text: Relax, the Black Mass won't start until master drags Astarion from whatever hole he's hiding in. We have time to find one more person.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Somewhere you and your master will never find him.

8.speaker: Pale Petras
8.text: You don't know what my lord is capable of. You don't know his power.

55.speaker: Dalyria
55.text: This is not the time, brother. The master must be told.

45.speaker: Pale Petras
45.text: Fine. But this isn't over - we'll see you again.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: No need to go looking - he'll find you soon enough.

16.speaker: Pale Petras
16.text: I'd like to see him try, the little worm.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: And what do I get if I tell you?

68.speaker: Pale Petras
68.text: How about we leave your blood inside your body?

15.speaker: Player
15.text: He's close. I'll see him at camp tonight.

2.speaker: Dalyria
2.text: We should go, brother. The master must be told.

21.speaker: Pale Petras
21.text: Yeah, let's go deliver the good news.

46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Both vampire spawn turn to mist and vanish, leaving just Astarion and the party in the room

30.speaker: Player
30.text: I'd be game, if you're looking for volunteers.

61.speaker: Pale Petras
61.text: Well hello, beautiful! Aren't you a sight to behold?

62.speaker: Dalyria
62.text: You must excuse my brother, he forgets that we have a very pressing engagement.

6.speaker: Pale Petras
6.text: You must excuse my sister, she's a terrible bore.

51.speaker: Pale Petras
51.text: But you look like someone who enjoys a party. There's a celebration being held in the palace of Cazador Szarr - why not join us?

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I'll skip the Black Mass. You will too if you know what's good for you.

20.speaker: Pale Petras
20.text: As if you know anything about it.

43.speaker: Dalyria
43.text: Come brother, we have wasted enough time.

40.speaker: Pale Petras
40.text: So it seems. I just need a minute, then we can go.

31.speaker: Pale Petras
31.text: Great! The palace looks out over the Lower City, you won't be able to miss it.

50.speaker: Dalyria
50.text: Forgive us for not escorting you there, but my brother and I must attend to another matter first.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I don't know. I don't normally accept invitations from strangers.

36.speaker: Pale Petras
36.text: Thank goodness we're such good friends, then!

32.speaker: Dalyria
32.text: This is not the time, Petras.

65.speaker: Pale Petras
65.text: Yes, dear sister, I know we have places to be. We'll leave once our good friends here have departed.

13.speaker: Pale Petras
13.text: I look forward to seeing you at the palace, though. It'll be a once-in-a-lifetime experience, I promise.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: I'll pass. Doesn't sound like my thing.

23.speaker: Pale Petras
23.text: A terrible pity, but if you find yourself in the Lower City, you're most certainly invited.

29.speaker: Dalyria
29.text: Are you ready to go now, brother? Have you been rejected enough?

9.speaker: Pale Petras
9.text: Hello beautiful, I didn't see you there.

38.speaker: Dalyria
38.text: We were just discussing a ... celebration being held in the palace of Cazador Szarr.
38.context: NodeContext: pause before 'celebration'. The event is actually a blood ritual, but they don't want to tell guests that.

34.speaker: Pale Petras
34.text: You should come! It'll be the talk of Baldur's Gate.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Black Mass? Is that the Ritual of Profane Ascension?

67.speaker: Dalyria
67.text: Of course not, we were merely discussing a... celebration to be held in the palace of Cazador Szarr.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Anyone dumb enough to get lured away by you two deserves whatever they get.

26.speaker: Pale Petras
26.text: I didn't realise we had company.

7.speaker: Dalyria
7.text: Please, pay my brother no mind. His imagination - and his mouth - get the better of him sometimes.

35.speaker: Dalyria
35.text: But it does not matter, we were just leaving anyway. Weren't we, Petras?

60.speaker: Pale Petras
60.text: Yes, of course, dear sister. I just need a moment and then we can leave.

28.speaker: Pale Petras
28.text: The Black Mass has been two centuries in the making. We can take five minutes to find one more person.
